extendedInfo.description: Sail the Caribbean in this turn-based strategy/role-playing game. Will you be peaceful trader, traveling from island to island with goods trying to exploit circumstances of high supply and demand? Or will you be a rapacious pirate, waging war on sea and on land against the enemies of your country. You decide!Compared to the new version of Pirates and Traders, Retro features simpler, more streamlined trade/piracy gameplay without most of the RPG elements.Features:- Play an open-ended pirate strategy game- Capture and plunder enemy ships for treasure- Raid heavily fortified ports- Buy and sell goods in the carribean- Customize your pirate with 5 skills- Sail the Carribean in any of 20 historical shipsThis is the old version of the "Pirates and Traders" game, re-released on the Android market for the benefit of those who prefer the version 1 game play over that of version 2. This version of the game is no longer actively maintained, though - time permitting - I will try to fix any bugs that remain. Contact us by e-mail with any bug reports."Pirates and Traders: Retro!" is ad-supported. If you would prefer to play without ads, get "Pirates and Traders: Retro Gold!"Follow us on Twitter: @MicaByteS

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: HTC EVO 3d.  The game works with very few FC\'s. Lots to do, and hours of game play. GaHarr!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: good game idea but when i travel to a different port its go to the last visted port instead..therefore everything is always the same price!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its a really fun game! But some more improvements can be made for the ships.got almost 80,000 money but cant do anything with it. Needs more updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game!
reviews.comment: As others have said, I prefer the retro to the current version. For one thing, the manual is relevant to the game. Skills and such make more sense. I don\'t care much about the graphics in the new version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mal
reviews.comment: Playing on my tablet, love the game, but no save option. Would love better fit on 10.1 screen, hence 4 stars. Great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would give this game 5 stars if it didn\'t force close so much. Also, after I play it for a while, the option of visiting the taverns disappears. That\'s very frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, addicting game!
reviews.comment: This game is a great one. It becomes more enjoyable as you get to grips with it, I\'ve been hooked during spare time the last few days!   Only problem I\'ve encountered is force closure at ranom, though game allows short period auto saves, soit is no great inconvenience.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it, the only thing i don\'t like is the set up when moving port to port. Other then that (battle, market, port view, etc...) is great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Proper old school
reviews.comment: Got this game when it first came out onto the market, as updates came out the game lost it\'s innocence but when I saw the retro version... happy days 5* for re-releasing the original.
reviews.author: simon thornton

reviews.title: Great game!
